title: Party Preparations Are Going Smoothly!
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>It’s done! Ayumu-chan, try this on.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Okay. ......How do I look?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Mm, it’s cute! This bat wings headband makes you look devilish, Ayumu-chan. It’s a very refreshing look!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Ehehe. Nozomi-san, you should try this one on.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>......What do you think?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>The black cat ears headband suits you perfectly! Ah, try this one on too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ah, I like this. A witch’s hat headband!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>This pumpkin headband is cute too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Let’s make something for everyone!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Alright! Let’s do this~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
